subject: Order # SSN3563
description_text:
Hey, 

I recently placed this order and it arrived today, but I am missing the baseplate for it! 

Thanks in advance,

conversations.body_text:
Everything else arrived perfect! Excited to use them


On Fri, Nov 21, 2025 at 6:30 PM Kleyton Slaybaugh <jkleyton99@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hey,
>
> I recently placed this order and it arrived today, but I am missing the
> baseplate for it!
>
> Thanks in advance,

Hi Kleyton Slaybaugh,      We apologize for the inconvenience. The Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently out of stock in our US warehouse. New inventory will be replenished tomorrow, and we will ship your order within the next two days.

Hey,

No worries! I’m super excited for it to arrive so I can give them a go,
fingers crossed it ships soon!

Thanks for your help!

On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 3:14 AM service@simsonn.com

Hey,

When available, could I get a tracking number for the package?

Thanks in advance!

Hey,

The package was delivered today and the baseplate appears to be all there.

I got the pedals installed and start looking towards the connections, only
to realize I didn’t get a usb cable to PC!



On Fri, Dec 5, 2025 at 6:19 AM service@simsonn.com

Disregard! I found the cable!

Everything is working as it should thanks for the help!
